'''Tenryou Commission Secret Letter''' is a Quest Item obtained alongside [[Official Tenryou Commission Document]] from [[Sayu]] after she swipes it from the [[Tenryou Commission]]'s headquarters during the "[[Proof of Guilt]]" [[Archon Quest]].
